alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:51PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 315 PM MST... At 251 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Sahuarita, or near Sahuarita, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Green Valley, East Sahuarita, and Summit. This includes Interstate 19 between mile markers 41 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
